noMisplacedAssertion.description:
Description

Checks that the assertion function, for exampleexpect, is placed inside anit()function call.
Placing (and using) theexpectassertion function can result in unexpected behaviors when executing your testing suite.
The rule will check for the following assertion calls:
expect
assert
assertEquals
However, the rule will ignore the following assertion calls:
expect.any
expect.anything
expect.closeTo
expect.arrayContaining
expect.objectContaining
expect.stringContaining
expect.stringMatching
expect.extend
expect.addEqualityTesters
expect.addSnapshotSerializer
If the assertion function is imported, the rule will check if they are imported from:
"chai"
"node:assert"
"node:assert/strict"
"bun:test"
"vitest"
Deno assertion module URL
Check theoptionsif you need to change the defaults.
noMisplacedAssertion.option: This rule has no specific options.
